title: Nation Invitational Tournament
desc: Three-time African champions, the Super Eagles, will participate in a Four-Nation Invitational Tournament scheduled to hold in Amman during next month’s FIFA international window. Nigeria will open their campaign against the senior national team of Iran national football team on Friday, March 27, 2026. The encounter is slated for the 17,000-capacity Amman International Stadium. On […]

desc: Cricket News: Former India cricketer Sanjay Bangar believes the India team have not fully lived up to expectations in the group stage of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup.

desc: Cricket News: Pakistan dropped ace left-arm pacer Shaheen Afridi and demoted star batter Babar Azam against Namibia in a must-win game after facing heavy defeat aga.

title: Transport Canada certifies some jets at centre of Trump's aviation tariff threat
